reviews.review_msg: Dr. Punja was by far one of my favourite biology professors at SFU. He is kind and cares about the success of his students. His notes are old fashion but clear and his exams are extremely fair. I was very nervous as it was my first 400 level course but it ended up being one of my favourite courses because of Zamirs teaching ability! (:

Dr. Punja is one of the best BISC profs at SFU. Clear lectures, clear format of the class and just such a knowledgeable guy. Extremely approachable, welcomes questions, and explains everything very clearly. He still writes his notes on the overhead and doesn't post them so class attendance is absolutely mandatory.
Teaches you what you need to know, then tests you on it. Awesome prof. and wonderful class!
He's an awesome teacher and has great notes!  He's very organized and approachable.
